coding_practice.title: Palindromic Substrings
coding_practice.description:
Given a string s, return the number of palindromic substrings in it.

A string is a palindrome when it reads the same backward as forward.

A substring is a contiguous sequence of characters within the string.
coding_practice.constraints:
1 <= s.length <= 1000
s consists of lowercase English letters.
coding_practice.explanation:
1. 遍歷每個字符，當作中心向兩側擴展檢查回文子串。
2. expand(i, i) 檢查奇數長度回文，expand(i, i+1) 檢查偶數長度回文。
3. 使用 list 包裝 count 以避免 nonlocal，累加回文子串數量。
4. 返回 count[0] 即為總回文子串數。
